title: Choose your next steps
subtitle1: Select an option below to indicate if you would like
p1: continue on to further competition, with the suppliers you selected, using the online service
p2: go back and edit your capability assessment
subtitle2: If you select Yes or No, you can't edit your capability assessment later.

form.question: Do you want to continue to start your further competition online?

hint.text: You will not be able to edit your capability assessment later.Only the suupliers you have selected will be invited to bid for your opportunity.
You will return to the first screen where you can select which steps you would like to edit, make changes, see a list of suppliers and continue on to online further competition.

Your capability assessment will be archived and can't be used to do a further competition.You will be able to access the archived capability assessment from your dashboard.You can download your list of suppliers on the next step.

backJump.title: Return to Write and publish your requirements
